title: And In Conclusion...: Life after ninety plus years
features: Life after 90+ years as seen in this delightful and occasionally insightful collection of stories and illustrations. A perfect gift for senior citizens, and even better for their relatives and care-givers; also hiarious cartoons, gift choice, those who do business with the elderly, or who are hoping to inherit? Read and enjoy.
description: The author's careers have included performing in radio/TV, real estate brokerage, teaching, public speaking, and motherhood (3 boys and 4 girls!) She has published 3 textbooks and 1 novel so far. At age 92 she lives in a senior center, enjoying good friends, fine wine and plenty of laughs.
